name: TV
description:
Client is 68 years old, single, has been staying with her younger sister (reported to have suboptimal IQ) in Tampines rental HDB after their father passed away and mother was sent to nursing home. They have been unemployed due to their medical conditions. They are mainly home and watching TV is their only enjoyment together. However, their TV recently spoilt. 
Hence, we are requesting for a TV for them. As client is unable to afford the delivery cost, he will need the cost to be borne by the donor. Thank you

passiton.name: TV cabinet / console w 6 drawers
passiton.description: Good condition solid wood 6 drawer-cabinet suitable for TV/living room or bedroom storage of various items eg. clothes, electronics accessories,  toys, sundry items, etc

passiton.description: Tv table flip it back to front and will look good as new

name: Stroller
description: Client is a pregnant lady who was laid off earlier this year from her job. Due to her pregnancy, she has been struggling to find suitable full-time employment. Client lives in a one-room rental flat with her husband and two children, aged 8 months and 8 years old. Client has been relying on a second-hand stroller for 8-month-old and stroller has been noted to be faulty, having difficulties to maneuver it and appears to be giving way. Please feel free to contact Claudine at 6365 8751 with regards to this request. Thank you.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

name: Bicycle
description: The client resides with 6 of her children. The household faces financial difficulties, client prioritizing providing children's basic needs - while having accumulated outstanding debts. This is especially so as 4 children are still studying, while her older 2 children are not working presently and she is the sole breadwinner. Considering their financially tight situation, the family wishes to request for a bicycle through PIO. We would be grateful if the donor can provide/pay for delivery of the bicycle to the client.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

passiton.name: Children bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Queen Size Bedframe & Mattress
description:
A 62-year-old senior lady, pmd user, living alone in a 3-room HDB flat has been unable to work for several years due to severe knee pain. She is currently surviving on her CPF retirement payout and still owes a substantial amount on her mortgage. She is requesting a donation of a queen-sized bed to ease her mobility issue as she is currently sleeping on a mattress on the floor.

Please WhatsApp messages Poh Yee at 8396 3345 or email to pohyee_ng@viriya.org.sg beforehand. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs. Thank you!

passiton.name: Queen size Bedframe and mattress
passiton.description: Queen size Bedframe and mattress in good condition. Contact me on actual collection date

name: Queen size mattress
description: Single-parent family of 4 consisting of 2 special needs children. Mother is unable to work due to high caregiving needs of her second child. Mattress has not been changed for arounf 3-4 years and the family of 4 sleeps on the same mattress daily

passiton.name: Queen size Bedframe and mattress
passiton.description: Queen size Bedframe and mattress in good condition. Contact me on actual collection date

name: TV Console
description: Client is a single mother taking care of 3 young boys on her own.  She is currently unemployed due to health and caregiving issues.  Client had a major surgery 2-3 years ago which affected her strength and employment options.  Besides her 2 school-going sons, client also helps to care for her friend's 3-year old son without any payment as her friend's family is not able to care for the baby.  Family lives in a rental flat and is dependent on financial assistance.  Client recently moved to another rental flat in Bedok and is looking for a TV console.  Please Whatsapp Calyssa at 84848596 or email weiyin.wong@thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar

name: Commode with wheels
description:
Commode
61-year-old patient has late stage cancer and hypertension. He requires a commode with wheels at home but he and his wife are unable to afford one. He is medically unfit for work while his wife is his caregiver. Wife hope for a new/unused one as patient are mindful about hygiene. Appreciate if donor can contact me at Whatsapp at 9727 4215. Thank you!

passiton.name: Commode chair with wheels
passiton.description: Very lightly used for shower time only. No rust. Seat pad over the pot allows it to be used as indoor wheelchair.
